description: This file contains an Android activity class named AuthActivity, which provides a user interface for email/password login with a sign-in button. It sets up UI components and handles the button click to finish the activity.

classes.name: AuthActivity
classes.description: An Android activity class that presents a login UI with email and password fields and a sign-in button. It handles user interaction and finishes the activity upon button click.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Overrides the AppCompatActivity.onCreate method to set up the activity layout and initialize UI components.
